content: I have until March 17th to meet some kind of QA on the PHD IG. What are the requirements? What if the errors are with the validator?
I hope they don't hit us for that. I've got a few that I can't fix.

I hope they don't hit us for that. I've got a few that I can't fix.

Same here. I have one that I can't fix and its been around forever. I have another 'information' statement that SHOULD be an error but its not but I can't fix it, either.
If it's caused by tooling and it's been raised, that won't affect your ability to publish.

If it's caused by tooling and it's been raised, that won't affect your ability to publish.

How can one be sure? Is there an official way to raise the issue (besides here)?
Here works, though if you want to raise it on gForge as well you can.

Here works, though if you want to raise it on gForge as well you can.
